phrases: And now, it is your morning horoscope countdown!
In the top spot, it is YOU, Pisces!
We predict you will be getting close to a certain special someone!
Kirie, we are at the amusement park!
I have not been to an amusement park in a while.
Indeed, I am looking forward to us all going together!
I am just glad you did not get hurt.
This is my first time to ride a bus, indeed!
We should get to Fujiyama Land in no time!
You must not push that button!
Land has a lot of rides, does not it?
I brought a pamphlet with me.
Indeed, I want to ride the roller coaster!
It is the longest in the world!
I-I want to ride the merry-go-round.
I have not been on one since I was a child...
I want to ride the spinning teacups.
I want to try this Hardcore Piloting Experience.
It looks like we are here!
We have reached the front gate, indeed!
This is indeed where they sell tickets!
With a free pass, you can ride anything you want.
You look so pretty in yours, Umaru!
They are doing an anime song concert!
Amusement parks even have events like THIS, huh?
I have to use the bathroom.
I think this horoscope is a lie...
I have been gone too long!
I cannot make Umaru worry more than I already have!
She might never invite me to anything again!
Oh, it is Cold and Bristly Girl!
You came to the anime concert as well, did you?
She had the same reaction as me...
Are you a friend of Sylphin's?
This is some merchandise I got at the anime event.
Sylphin, the show's over, so I will be going now.
He is quite thoughtful, is not he?
By the way, Kirie, had you met him before?
There is no laughter at all in those eyes!
Well, what do you say we ride something?
That was meant for kids, so the seats were a little crowded, huh?
I could have used an airbag...
I would like to invite Umaru to ride a spinning teacup with me...
Indeed, I wish to ride THAT!
Indeed, it is almost our turn in line!
You cannot ride if you are less than 140 cm tall.
We were in line for an hour...
There is nothing we can do about it now.
Today has been nothing but bad luck.
This is not just about me, though.
I do not want to inconvenience the others, so I will just keep quiet.
Kirie, let us ride the Ferris Wheel.
Good thing you could use Alex's present as a hair fastener, huh?
I-it is just me and Umaru, alone together.
It is pretty boring, is not it?
We wasted an hour in line for the roller coaster because of me.
Then, I worried everyone by crying out loud...
I could not even take a decent photo for my free pass.
This is all I can talk about...
Jeez... there is no way she will want to hang out with me again.
It is been a LOT of fun, Kirie!
We have not gone on THAT yet, have we?
You are getting an award in front of the whole school?
Yeah... it is a friggin' pain...
You would not think THIS person would get an award...
Everyone will be rooting for you, so do not flake out.
I do not even really care about it...
She will be getting an award today for having the highest GPA!
You shall not beat me on these upcoming midterms!
I, Sylphinford Tachibana, will take first place!
I, Sylphinford Tachibana, will take first place!
You have thought of Umaru as your rival, have not you?
Do you really wish her well?
C-come to think of it, before I started hanging out with you all, I DID think of Umaru as my rival...
But now, I am as happy for her as if it were myself.
It is up until now that you have been strange.
The award ceremony will soon commence.
For academic excellence in general coursework: Umaru Doma.
My friends are all supporting me...
They are all happy for me!
Next up, the award for academic excellence in AP courses goes to...
That was a splendid awards ceremony!
That was the first time I have seen someone from the AP classes.
They are in a separate building, so...
Your grades are beyond reproach, Umaru.
If you like, we could move you into the AP curriculum...
Have I met that girl somewhere before?
This whole time, what I have searched for has been right in front of me.
The light of justice: Cura Big-Bang!
I... I have no more doubts!
That was wonderful, was not it, Sensei?
The scene where Big-Bang became part of the group, right!
Big-Bang was a loner at first, but in the end, she had the courage to make friends with the others.
That long process made the climax so much more powerful!
Was not it great, Cold and Bristly Girl?
I am the Master's one and only disciple!
So, Alex, do you go back to Germany when you want to see your friends?
I am ashamed to admit it, but when I was in Germany...
I was not like Big-Bang, but I was pretty withdrawn.
One day, I could not bring myself to go to school.
I spent my days online or watching anime.
Once you have locked yourself indoors, it is hard to go back outside, is not it?
I convinced myself I did not need to interact with others in order to live.
My savior arrived, the one who suggested I go to high school in Japan.
That was when my life changed.
You have both been so kind to me since I joined the company...
And thanks to you, I got to meet Sensei and even Cold and Bristly Girl!
I get it now; Everyday life means people helping people.
The light of justice: Cura Big-Bang!
Say, let us come up with some sweet poses for those key scenes!
Even Cold and Bristly Girl is getting in on it, huh?
D-do not go getting the wrong idea!
I am the Master's top pupil!
This is why I participate in what SHE wants to do!
So, let us all do it together!
The light of justice: Cura Big-Bang!
The light of justice: Cura Big-Bang!
I told you everything on the phone!
We have to celebrate Hikari's award!
Let us mark the occasion by watching the Precura Blu-ray box set!
The final scene where Big-Bang become part of the group is fantastic!
This guy has not changed at all since middle school.
This guy has not changed at all since middle school.
Sen... I mean, Umaru and I watched some anime again today!
I-I do not need every little detail, you know!
I would sure like some chilled rice soup...
Rolling around with my pretty kitty, Necolumbus...
Maybe I am fixin' to up and die!
I made you some chilled rice soup.
Are not no way that will happen.
And you are not eaten, so your body's all weak.
That is the last memory I have of my brother.
I ate it and I am all better now!
Can you teach me how to make...?
Your brother had to go and get a job.
Reckon he will be back soon.
I still did not understand why he left, but...
Nana, that restaurant we went to in Tokyo was great, huh?
One day, I am going to live in Tokyo too!
Do not see as how it is a big deal.
We have all been to Tokyo before.
But you are not never been there alone.
Plus, visitin' somewhere do not mean you can LIVE there.
But, Tokyo's too far for me to go to school there and live here.
He sort of reminds me of my brother.
I would spoken to Umaru's brother a few times, and maybe...
maybe I have sort of thought of him as MY brother.
You are really kind, are not you?
It is hot today, so if you stay outside too long, you will get a heatstroke.
It is like that time before, when my head was all fuzzy...
But somehow, it is not scary.
It is a happy kind of fuzzy.
That amusement park was fun indeed!
I would like to go again.
Kirie seemed a little off-put at first, but by the end, she was indeed enjoying herself!
I am not sure I follow, but I shall accept that compliment!
